publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-242.2 Ross Finnie: Agriculture and Rural Affairs-As an amendment to motion (S1M-242) in the name of Mr Alex Salmond, leave out from "drastic" to end and insert "difficulties being faced by the agriculture industry; endorses the principle contained in the Partnership for Scotland agreement of working to support and enhance rural life and the rural economy; commends the steps already taken by the Scottish Executive to achieve these aims, and supports the Executive in its determination to promote long-term sustainable development, both in the agriculture industry and throughout rural Scotland."
